title: Jesus Camp
content:
I got Jesus Camp the other day; a few questions.

1. Has anyone seen it, and if so: what was your opinion?
2. If you're Christian, and live in the US of A - does this seem crazy to you?

I personally had to pause the movie every 10 minutes as I couldn't handle the brainwashing of young kids in the way it's shown. It's disgusting, and I'd like to believe that what's portrayed is the extreme, because, after all, the US has a lot of power and sway and say in the world.

-- discuss? --------------------
[url=http://www.szevvy.net]www.szevvy.net[/url], for all your Wombat needs. You know you want to.
A member of the LevelLord fan club.

title: Re: Jesus Camp
content:
It was a big day on JEEESUS RANCH...
Jeeesus ranch.

Never heard of the movie. Although... now that I poked around on the net and read some reviews... This seems kinda... messed up. I'm going to have to watch it for myself now.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-shikadi.gif[/img]

Or not. I would probably not watch the whole thing. Those kind of movies are disturbing to me. Especially how they made it a "camp." When you take someone away from society and any other kind of normal, outside influences you can more easily influence their minds. This can be good or bad but in all ways it is brainwashing. They have NOTHING ELSE TO do except what they are told. (Pray, what to think etc.)-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

title: Re: Jesus Camp
content:
Yeah that's crazy to me.

I would also say its evil.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img]

Actually I think lots of different groups in the U.S.A. are trying to tell everyone what to think and do.

So I got a problem with those people.

And...

Its not cool to call other people satan.

title: Re: Jesus Camp
content:
I saw this on Google Video once. It was pretty painful to watch. I was all WTF when she made them pray to that cardboard cutout of Bush. Also, I didn't like that kid with the mullet.

But I also saw that Louis Theroux BBC documentary about the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Westboro_Baptist_Church]Westboro Baptist Church[/url]. That was about 10 times worse, I think. Utterly appalling.[center]TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS[/center]

title: Re: Jesus Camp
content:
Eh, it's no worse than various other indoctrinations going on around the place. We can only hope that the march of common sense will eventually crush them, but I doubt it.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!

title: opiate
content:
Choices always were a problem for you.
What you need is someone strong to guide you.
Deaf and blind and dumb and born to follow,
what you need is someone strong to guide you...
like me,
like me.

If you want to get your soul to heaven,
trust in me.
Don't judge or question.
You are broken now,
but faith can heal you.
Just do everything I tell you to do.
Deaf and blind and dumb and born to follow.
Let me lay my holy hand upon you.

My God's will
becomes me.
When he speaks out,
he speaks through me.
He has needs
like I do.
We both want
to rape you.

Jesus Christ, why don't you come save my life.
Open my eyes and blind me with your light
and your lies.

--Rev. Maynard ;-)
